login.invalidApiKey: API Key is Invalid, please try again.
login.errorNetwork: An error occurred, please check your network connection and try again later.
login.modalExplanation: OpenAI Key is a key to access the OpenAI platform API. In order to use its AI features, you need to have a valid OpenAI Key. To obtain an OpenAI Key, visit https://beta.openai.com/signup and create an account. You can find the key in the API Keys section of your OpenAI Dashboard.

home.gpt4VerifyError: Sorry, your key does not support gpt-4
home.thanksMessage: First of all, thank you very much for using this website. Due to my limited programming abilities and energy, I believe there are still many flaws and loopholes. Since I haven't developed a back-end yet and openAI has strict API management rules, I cannot publicly share my API. As soon as it becomes public, my API will be blocked. I apologize for the inconvenience. However, you can privately ask me for one. It would be better to purchase one yourself; otherwise, it's easy to get blocked. I believe GPT will trigger a new industrial revolution, further reducing authority and improving productivity. This is an exciting moment! I hope I can contribute to this and help more people.
home.author: Author: Wu Hao
home.email: Email: wuhaodawang87@gmail.com (I created this when I was younger, so it looks a bit childish)

userInfo.logoutConfirmation: Are you sure you want to logout?

noteHelper.formTypePlaceholder: What is it? Article? Meeting? Course?

prompt.intro: Now you are a note/meeting assistant
prompt.title: Title
prompt.preferences: Please output based on the content above
prompt.sayLng: Please reply to me in English.
prompt.removeClutter: Please summarize any nonsense (no valid information, irrelevant information) from the information above separately at the end, and don't include it in the main text. If there's no valid information, you can just write a summary of the nonsense.

prompt.intro: Now you will provide legal consultation
prompt.extra: In addition to the basic answer, please include the following information:
